snippet: Stocks rose broadly in afternoon trading after the release of some encouraging economic data and the news that the chip maker Intel would acquire Altera.
abstract: Stocks rise after positive news about United States manufacturing growth accelerating in May and news about Intel acquisition of Altera.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose broadly in afternoon trading after the release of some encouraging economic data and the news that the chip maker Intel would acquire Altera.

headline.main: Deal News and Bright Economic Reports Nudge the Market Higher
